question: The major difference between cartilage and bone is that:
option1: While Bone is a part of skeletal system, cartilage is a part of some other system
option2: While bone is made of collagen and calcium salts, cartilage is made of only collagen
option3: While bones have blood vessels, Cartilage have no blood vessels
option4: All of the above statements are correct
answer: While bones have blood vessels, Cartilage have no blood vessels
explanation: The primary difference between bone and cartilage is that cartilage is flexible and lacks blood vessels. They are both part of the skeletal system. Bone and cartilage are connective tissues made up of collagen and calcium salts.
